record.field: Coog can't assign a new number for the sequence "%(sequence_name)s": The limit of %(number_max)s is reached. Please define a new sub-sequence period or increase limits.
Could not get a valid sub-sequence at date %(date)s for the sequence "%(sequence)s". Please define a new sub-sequence period on increase limits.
The sub-sequence period is invalid: %(start_date)s greater than %(end_date)s.
